name: Rogue Empire: Dungeon Crawler RPG
descr:
The shadow came, destroying everything in its way! Every kingdom in Ethistos was losing ground and lives. When all seemed lost... the First Shadow disappeared! Where? How? No one knows... But the marks of their coming still linger across Ethistos!

[b]Rogue Empire[/b] is a tactical turn-based RPG with randomly generated content and heavy Rogue-like elements. Choose one of multiple character combinations and advance it with unique abilities! 
​[h2]Key features:[/h2][list][li][b] Several Game Modes![/b] 
[list][li] 2 Story Campaigns! 
[/li][li] A unique infinite dungeon that stacks challenges against you? 
[/li][li] Timed mode! 
[/li][li] Story Mode! [/li][/list][/li][li] Randomly generated dungeons, items and events! Play again and again![/li][/list][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/650940/extras/GeneratedDungeon.jpg?t=1725026132[/img]
[list][li] Unique class building based of Trading Card Games concepts.[/li][/list][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/650940/extras/DrawClassDeckUpdated.jpg?t=1725026132[/img]
[list][li] Flaming swords and many more legendary items with unique effects![/li][/list][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/650940/extras/FierySoulCutter.gif?t=1725026132[/img]
[list][li] Champion monsters and many unique bosses to defeat![/li][/list][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/650940/extras/Boss.jpg?t=1725026132[/img]
[list][li] 7 races and 5 distinct classes to choose![/li][/list][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/650940/extras/Races.jpg?t=1725026132[/img]
[list][li] A huge map with exploration events, side quests and story!
[/li][li] Soul essence: Dying will provide you with valuable soul essence, used to unlock perks and new options for your next adventures!
[/li][li] A beautifully illustrated story with multiple endings![/li][/list][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/650940/extras/Story.jpg?t=1725026132[/img]
[list][li] Leave your mark on the leader-boards![/li][/list]
detail:
名称: Rogue Empire: Dungeon Crawler RPG
类型: 独立, 角色扮演
开发商: Portal Entertainment
发行商: Portal Entertainment
发行日期: 2019 年 1 月 25 日
review: 全部评测: 特别好评 (327) - 此游戏的 327 篇用户评测中有 85% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (327 篇中的 85%) 发布至今
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10
处理器: 2 GHz
内存: 1 GB RAM
显卡: 800x600 minimum resolution
存储空间: 需要 1 GB 可用空间
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。

Mac OS X
最低配置:
操作系统: Mac OS X 10.5.8 or better
处理器: 2 GHz
内存: 1 GB RAM
显卡: 800x600 minimum resolution
存储空间: 需要 1 GB 可用空间

SteamOS + Linux
最低配置:
处理器: 2 GHz
内存: 1 GB RAM
显卡: 800x600 minimum resolution
存储空间: 需要 1 GB 可用空间
